verbose_text: Thanks to these investigations, although NG2 / CSPG4 expression was restricted to a subgroup of patients presenting MLL rearrangements, we can theoretically suppose that all patients with NG2 / CSPG4 positive leukemic blasts could have coincident MLL rearrangements XREF_BIBR, i.e. NG2 / CSPG4 expression was asserted to be " diagnostic " of MLL gene aberrations.
